I am new to use Heritrix. By following the instructions, I installed it on =
a RedHat. When I was trying to run "heritrix --help" or "heritrix --admin=
=3DLOGIN:PASSWORD", the computer just prints "heritrix is starting ........=
...." and forever. I waited for 10 minutes but it didn't print the lines it=
 is supposed to print. Any one can help me on this?
